definition: specially engaged/employed or commissioned for a special task
special/unique/distinguished/especially/unusual/very/abbr. for 特克斯[te4 ke4 si1], tex
to make an appointment/to invite/approximately/pact/treaty/to economize/to restrict/to reduce (a fraction)/concise
to weigh in a balance or on a scale

sentences.english: He is also a contributing editor to The National Interest.
sentences.chinese: 他也是一名《国家利益》特约编辑。

sentences.english: And 15 airlines will have special tariffs.
sentences.chinese: 并与15家航空公司定有特约运价。

sentences.english: Naomi Li is a freelance writer based in London.
sentences.chinese: 李洁华是驻伦敦的特约撰稿人。

sentences.english: Tabs welded to stringers for bulkhead attachment.
sentences.chinese: 标签焊接特约的舱壁附件。

sentences.english: Skin panels and stringers arrive from the steel supply company on a pallet.
sentences.chinese: 皮肤面板和特约记者到达的钢铁供应公司托盘。

sentences.english: Lio Beardsley graduated from the hk Polytechnic University with a degree in photography and is currently working as a freelance illustrator.
sentences.chinese: 香港理工大学摄影系毕业，目前是一名特约插画家。

sentences.english: the applicant company is appointed by ford motor company as an authorized dealer.
sentences.chinese: 该申请公司被指定为福特汽车公司的特约经销商。

sentences.english: To connect the voice of renowned legal experts, special observers Yue Shen mountain.
sentences.chinese: 来连线著名法律专家中国之声特约观察员岳屾山。

sentences.english: It was about a year ago that Fossett vanished. The remains of his plane just found.
sentences.chinese: 佛色特约一年前失踪，如今才找到他的飞机残骸。

sentences.english: Sunwin coach special service center set up at bashi-yiqi transit co.
sentences.chinese: 上海巴士一汽成立申沃客车特约维修中心。

sentences.english: He is an authorized dealer of imported auto parts.
sentences.chinese: 他是进口汽车零件的特约经销商。

sentences.english: In such occation, please contact with us or our special agency directly.
sentences.chinese: 此时，请直接与本公司或特约经销店接洽。

sentences.english: For this issue we have specially requested Professor Qian to write a book review.
sentences.chinese: 这一期我们特约钱教授写了一篇书评。

sentences.english: Above is the report by VOA correspondent Yan Ming from Toronto.
sentences.chinese: 以上是美国之音特约记者严明从多伦多发来的报道。

sentences.english: At present we are dealer by special engagement and long-term agents of many internationally famous brands.
sentences.chinese: 我们已经成为国际著名品牌的特约经销和长期代理。

definition: chief editor (of newspaper)/abbr. for 總編輯|总编辑
regular column or segment (in a publication or broadcast program)/program (TV or radio)
